description: This beautiful East Flatbush one family home. This home is a semi-attached 3-bedroom duplex with a full finished basement (w/ a separate entrance). The home boasts a fully fenced backyard with utility shed, a new boiler and water heater, active solar panels attached to the roof, lots of windows for natural light and tons of closet space. Close to plenty shops, parks and public transportation. WONT LAST!!

Situated on a quiet, tree lined, residential street of the Flatlands/ Bergen beach border, 1276 East 59 street is meticulously renovated move in ready single family that will captivate you from the moment you arrive with its warm & welcoming energy. Sitting on a 22x100 lot featuring a wide private driveway that can fit multiple cars, and a spacious rear yard to enjoy outdoor gatherings. This turn key, move in ready single family is the perfect opportunity for buyers looking for space. 
 
 Open the door and enter an expansive sun drenched, modern open concept living/dining area which provides great space for entertaining. The chefs granite kitchen is equipped with floor to ceiling cabinetry, adorned with a full fleet of stainless steel appliances & Island for bar stool seating. Spacious bedroom & full bath on first floor as well.
 Up a flight of stairs 3 well proportioned bedrooms awaits you. The elegant primary suite is equipped with a private en suite. Down the hall a fully tiled bathroom is adorned with state of the art wall & floor tiles. 
 
 The high ceiling full finished basement serves as the perfect in-law suite, media den, home office, storage space or additional recreational space. 
 
 Renovations include brand new select wide oak wood flooring, recessed lighting, brand new electrical, heating, plumbing, energy saving Split unit A/C Systems throughout. 
 
 Located with close proximity to major transportation, schools, shopping centers, restaurants, cafes, parks and many other vibrant neighborhood amenities. Just off Ralph Avenue, Veterans Avenue, Utica avenue, Flatbush Avenue.

Welcome to this charming single-family home in the heart of Brooklyn! This spacious residence features a bright living room, a formal dining room perfect for entertaining, and a large eat-in kitchen equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances. Offering 3 generously sized bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and a dedicated home office, this home provides comfort and flexibility for any lifestyle. The fully finished basement adds valuable living or recreation space. Enjoy outdoor gatherings in the private backyard and the convenience of your own driveway parking. Ideally located near public transportation, schools, and shopping—this is the perfect place to call home!

Gerritsen Beach! WATERFRONT! This well-maintained home was raised only a few short years ago! Situated on the canal, there are 2 boast slips, newer piles and bulkhead. The rear deck is tremendous and great for summer entertaining. From the lower deck you come up to a smaller deck that overlooks the entire canal. This smaller deck lets you enter into the homes' formal dining area, then to a full kitchen with laundry area, a 3/4 bath, large living room with vaulted ceilings and a den. The primary bedroom is on the second floor with a large walk-in closet and spectacular views. All with a loft like setting. Don't miss this opportunity to own a great waterfront property.

Mill Basin- Semi-Detached, spacious 3 bedroom home with a private parking pad out front, and a brand new pool with surrounding deck in the backyard. This clean, move-in-ready home has been very well-maintained and measures 16’ wide offering the new homeowner spacious, worry-free comfort for many years ahead. Some of the standout features include an open floor plan main level, and a full, finished basement with separate entrance, high ceilings, full bath and summer kitchen downstairs. Upstairs there are 3 nice sized bedrooms (all with closets) and a stylish brand new full bathroom. Notable other big ticket items that have been replaced over the last few years include new windows all around, as well as a new roof, hot water heater and gas-fired boiler. This home sits on a quiet, low-traffic side street, yet it’s within a short walk to all of the excellent schools, parks, dining and shopping options that this desirable suburban neighborhood has to offer. Listed Exclusively with Calemine & Co. Real Estate. Call us directly with any questions or to learn about the upcoming showing schedule. Listing status updated daily.

Great Gerritsen Beach Property Available now - true waterfront property in Gerritsen Beach. This 2-bedroom, 1.5-bath single-family home,approx. 952 sqft, sits directly on Gerritsen Creek and features a floating dock, two boat slips, and a double-deck. Ideal for boating, relaxing, BBQs, family time. This house has 2 bedrooms, 1.5 baths, big beautiful eat-in kitchen overlooking the back deck, looking onto Gerritsen Creek. There is a big basement with 2 separate outside entrances. The entire house atmosphere is very relaxing and comfortable. Close by is Marine Park, the Brooklyn Public Library. Montessori Minds preschool, kiddie beach. Nearby is Clemente's across the creek and Tamaqua Beach Bar, Victoria's Pizza and near Emmons Avenue and the UA Theatre. The bus runs up and down Gerritsen Avenue for easy transportation. The Belt Parkway is 5 minutes away. Lot size: 24x70 / Building size: 14x34 Please see the attached video, along with the pictures, to enjoy what is offered in this house. On Zillow, please see Facts & Features, click on Show More and you will see the video tour. On Trulia, please scroll to see all home details for 18 Gotham Ave, click on See All to access virtual tour.

Welcome to 518 East 40th Street, a classic Brooklyn gem nestled in the heart of East Flatbush. This solidly built single-family home offers 3 spacious bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, and an unfinished basement – all brimming with opportunity for customization and personal touch. Step inside and discover the charm of traditional layout and natural light throughout. The living and dining areas provide a warm, inviting atmosphere, perfect for gatherings or quiet evenings at home. Upstairs, three generously sized bedrooms offer comfortable living space for family or guests. The home features oil heat, a shared driveway, and a detached garage – a rare find in this neighborhood. While the property does need some TLC, it’s a fantastic canvas for investors, first-time buyers, or anyone ready to create their dream home. Situated in a vibrant, well-established East Flatbush community, 518 East 40th Street is close to schools, parks, shopping, and public transportation. Enjoy easy access to the B46 and B8 buses, as well as nearby subway lines that connect you to downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan. Local amenities, cultural institutions, and healthcare centers like SUNY Downstate Medical Center are just minutes away. Don't miss your chance to own a piece of Brooklyn real estate with incredible potential. Schedule your private showing today!

One Family Home Semi-Detached Move in Condition in Old Mill Basin. The home features 3 bedrooms, 1 3/4 bath and a full finished basement. Open concept living room and dining room, central air and heat, ceiling fans, kitchen (breakfast nook, granite counters, cherrywood cabinets and stainless steel appliances) with a door that leads to a nice back porch, hardwood/ tiled floors throughout the house, 1 full bath with a jacuzzi tub on the second floor, 3/4 bathroom in basement and has a backyard. Close to public transportation, shopping, schools, house of worships, playgrounds, and recreational areas. Owner is willing to hear all good offers. Come see for yourself before this home is sold!! Schedule a viewing today and make this house your home! This home will not last!

Just Listed! Perfectly Renovated Single-Family Gem on Avenue M – Flatlands Welcome to your dream home! This fully renovated, sun-filled single-family residence in the heart of Flatlands is fresh on the market and move-in ready! Bright, airy, and beautifully updated throughout, this home checks every box. The first floor features an inviting open-concept layout with a spacious living room that’s drenched in natural light — perfect for entertaining or cozy nights in. You’ll find generously sized bedrooms with excellent closet space, a large family room, and a convenient laundry area. Enjoy the perks of a private driveway, garage, and a fantastic backyard — ideal for kids, weekend barbecues, or simply relaxing under the sky. Located just minutes from shopping, parks, schools, houses of worship, and multiple transit options to get you wherever you need to go with ease. This is an ideal starter home for any family — fresh, clean, and ready for your personal touch. A property this perfect won’t stay available for long… Call today and let’s make it yours!

Charming & Spacious Home in Sought-After Paerdegat/Canarsie Area!
 
 Welcome to your dream home nestled in the highly desirable Paerdegat/Canarsie area of Brooklyn! Situated on a picturesque, tree-lined street, this property offers an exceptional blend of comfort, convenience, and potential. With a little TLC, this home could truly shine and become the perfect space for its future owners.
 
 Key Features:
 4 Bedrooms, 4 Bathrooms: Including a large primary suite ensuite full bathroom.
 Expansive Living Spaces: Enjoy a full living room, dining room, and a large eat-in kitchen—perfect for entertaining and family gatherings.
 Three Levels of Living: Includes a fully finished basement with its own bathroom and a separate outside entrance, ideal for guests or additional recreational space.
 Outdoor Amenities: A rear balcony off the first floor provides the perfect spot for relaxation or outdoor dining.
 Parking Convenience: Private driveway with an attached garage ensures easy parking.
 Prime Location:
 Residential Tranquility: Set on a quiet, tree-lined street with a friendly neighborhood vibe.
 Excellent Accessibility: Close to transportation options, shopping, and dining.
 Commuter-Friendly: Conveniently near the Belt Parkway for easy travel.
 This property is a rare gem, offering a spacious layout, unbeatable proximity to everything you need, and the opportunity to add your personal touch. With a little work, you can transform this house into the home of your dreams.
 
 Don’t miss out

Beautifully Maintained Single-Family Home in Canarsie with Income Potential
 
 Welcome to this spacious and impeccably maintained single-family home, nestled in the heart of Canarsie. This updated property offers a perfect blend of comfort, functionality, and potential for rental income.
 
 Step into a huge living room featuring elegant hardwood floors that seamlessly flow into the formal dining room -perfect for entertaining. The first floor also boasts extra closet space, a convenient full bathroom, and a kitchen with durable porcelain flooring, along with a laundry/storage area.
 
 
 The modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and offers access to a beautifully maintained backyard. The backyard features vinyl gates, brick fencing at the front of the house, a shed, and ample space to install an in-ground pool-ideal for summer gatherings. A shared driveway provides convenient off-street parking and easy access to the home. Additionally, a unique feature of this home is the rope in the basement, which provides a convenient stairway for easy access between the two levels.
 
 Upstairs, you'll find three spacious bedrooms with generous closet space, including a master suite with an en suite bathroom that adds extra convenience and privacy. The full bathroom upstairs is equipped with all the necessary amenities for comfort.
 
 The fully finished basement has its own separate side entrance, making it an excellent option for rental income or extended family living. It includes one bedroom, a large storage room, ample closet space, and a bathroom with a stand-up shower. This basement provides both privacy and functionality, making it a valuable asset to the home.
 
 Additional features include steel doors for enhanced security, a newer roof in excellent condition, full insulation throughout the home, and a layout that's been meticulously maintained and is move-in ready.
 
 This home truly checks all the boxes for comfortable living, offering ample space both inside and out. Don't miss this incredible opportunity in a desirable Canarsie location.

This beautifully maintained single-family residence offers the perfect blend of comfort, space, and functionality. Nestled in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood, this home features 2 spacious bedrooms,2 updated bathrooms, and a modern, open-concept kitchen that flows effortlessly into the living and dining area. An spacious backyard that has 3 garages for storage or car parking.

Welcome to this Gerritsen Beach fully renovated beauty!! Newly raised two floor corner property with a brand new roof and brand new siding. Fully renovated smart home with radiant heat and ceramic tile floors on both floors. First floor features a huge kitchen, dining area, 1 bathroom, (1 bedroom removed to open up kitchen area and work space), laundry room which holds the boiler as well and a living room with cathedral ceilings. Kitchen is all new with appliances. Second floor Includes 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom with a Mr. Steam shower. Master bedroom features 2 closets with one being a walk in. Second bedroom has 2 closets. Brand new ductless central air condition/ heating unit installed. House is raised and has 5 foot crawl space for storage. Newly cemented exterior floors of the yard. Comes with a shed for storage and a gazebo for the yard. Freshly done landscaping on the side of the house with stone finishes. New bow window's have been installed on the first floor. House has the potential to add a 3rd bedroom on the first floor. This is a perfect move in condition home to call your own with plenty of parking space around.

Nestled on a tree-lined street in the heart of Canarsie, this charming single-family home blends classic Brooklyn appeal with modern comfort. Lovingly maintained, the home welcomes you from the moment you enter. You'll feel the warm, natural light flood the spacious interior, showcasing cozy carpeted floors and smartly laid-out living spaces. With four bedrooms and two full baths, it's a perfect family home—or an astute investment for rental or multi generational family living, thanks to the fully finished basement. Equipped with Solar panels to reduce electric bills.
 Lovely private backyard oasis—ample enough for weekend barbecue get-togethers, summertime lounging or pets to roam freely.
 Beyond the home’s walls, you’ll find the best of Canarsie —friendly sidewalks, nearby parks like Seaview Park and Canarsie Pier, plentiful shopping, local eateries, places of worship, and convenient access to the L train at Rockaway Parkway just minutes away.

Welcome to this charming one-family home in the heart of Cypress Hills, a neighborhood that borders Woodhaven and Ozone Park in Queens. This home features three bedrooms and three bathrooms, a finished basement with a bilco door, and a brick exterior. The home is conveniently located close to schools, shopping, and public transit, with easy access to the J and A lines to the city. The home has a lot size of 1,812 square feet and was built in 1910. This home is a great opportunity for anyone looking for a cozy and affordable place to call their own in Brooklyn. Don't miss this chance to see it for yourself!

brokerName: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Fillmore Real Estate
description:
Welcome to this solid brick 3-bedroom duplex nestled in the heart of Madison, just moments from Marine Park and the vibrant shops and restaurants along Avenue U. This well-maintained home offers comfortable, convenient living in one of Brooklyn’s most desirable neighborhoods.
 
 The second floor features three bright bedrooms and an updated full bathroom. The main level boasts a spacious living and dining area, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The semi-finished basement provides flexible space for a home office, playroom, or additional living area.
 
 Additional highlights include a community driveway with a private 1-car garage, ensuring easy parking, and a low-maintenance brick exterior. This home is in move-in condition.
 
 Located close to major bus routes, parks, schools, and shopping, this is an ideal opportunity for homeowners or investors alike.

Located on a quiet cul-de-sac just beside Amersfort Park, this semi-detached single-family home offers over 2,000 SF of space, light, and versatility that city dwellers crave—with the added bonus of a backyard and private parking.
 
 Spanning four levels, the home features hardwood floors, high ceilings, and abundant storage throughout. The main level offers a comfortable flow between the living room, formal dining room, and eat-in kitchen, with a bright sunroom that adds charm and flexibility to the layout. Upstairs, three spacious bedrooms support rest and privacy, while the finished attic serves beautifully as a fourth bedroom, playroom, or creative space with additional storage.
 
 The fully finished basement includes a full bathroom, kitchenette, and a separate entrance—ideal for recreation, a home gym, guest space, or other personal use.
 
 Outdoors, enjoy a private backyard and a shared driveway with a detached garage. Convenient to nearby amenities along Flatbush Avenue and Kings Highway, Brooklyn College, and the 2/5 train lines, this is a welcoming home in a quiet, connected corner of East Flatbush.
This beautiful home is featured with 3 bedroom 2 and half baths. living room, dining room, attached car garage. must see.

Solid Brick 3 bedroom Duplex 
 Full Basement with separate entrance. Parking garage and separate backyard. Quiet Treelined block. Shown by appointment

JUST LISTED! This freshly updated 3-bedroom home in East New York features a private driveway for 3 cars and, a spacious back and front yard. A beautiful modern kitchen and finished basement that is ideal for extra space. Enjoy a bright living room, and dining area, with 1.5 baths. Conveniently located near schools, parks, bodegas, key food, Food Bazaar, and community centers. Public transit bus lines are, B15, B20, and B83 along Linden Blvd Subway lines are L, 2,3, and LLRR along Van Siclen Ave. This is the perfect house for first-time home buyers or someone looking to downsize. Come and take a look at this beautiful semi-detached house.

Discover the possibilities in this 3-Bedroom, 1.5-Bath Attached Brick Duplex located in the sought-after Marine Park/Madison area. Measuring 17' x 32', this home offers solid bones and a classic layout, featuring hardwood floors throughout and a full unfinished basement ready to be transformed. With a little TLC, this property presents a great opportunity to add your personal touch and value. Whether you're a homeowner looking to customize or an investor seeking potential, this is a home you won’t want to miss. Ideally located near houses of worship, shopping, and public transportation, you'll enjoy convenience and community.
